title: Dmitry Buterin | Layer Zero
description:
Dmitry Buterin joins David for the premiere of Layer Zero, a new Bankless podcast that explores the human side of Ethereum. Beneath the technological innovation and socioeconomic disruption happening in the DeFi space, there are human beings â€“ really interesting, thoughtful, passionate human beings. Layer Zero is at the bottom of the economic stack: the people.

For the debut episode, it only made sense to bring on Dmitry, father of Ethereum founder Vitalik. Topics include Vitalikâ€™s youth, Soviet Russia, and universal consciousness, but they donâ€™t stop there. How often does Dmitry check ETH Price? Whatâ€™s his workout routine? Tune in and find out.
